Our attention has been drawn to multiple and unverified social media accounts and handles used in impersonating BLORD GROUP and our Chaiman Mr. Linus Williams aka Blord to malign the integrity and core values of BLORD GROUP.


BLORD GROUP wishes to inform the general public that these fake social media accounts are being administered by unscrupulous and malicious individuals who have no affiliation to Blord Group or the authority to disseminate information or act on behalf of the Company. The only social media handles of Blord Group and our Chairman are;

Instagram: @blord_official, @blordgroup, @jetpro.ng, @jetpay.ng, @bitshop.co, @billpoint.co, @blordhomes.ltd

Facebook: Billpoint.co

Twitter: @realbitcoinlord, @Billpoint.co. @jetpayafrica

and we hereby disassociate ourselves from the nefarious activities of the unscrupulous individuals operating the fake accounts.


Members of the public are therefore advised to be weary and avoid dealing, in any manner whatsoever, with the dubious individuals pretending to be Blord Group and our chairman Mr. Linus Williams. All information emanating from these accounts are not from BLORD GROUP or our Chairman and should, therefore, be disregarded and dismissed with the contempt it deserves.


BLORD GROUP will not assume responsibility or be held liable for the consequences of decisions made based on information from any social media accounts other than the handles listed above.ðŸ“Œ
